meanings.definition: Extremely small or fine in texture or quality.
meanings.sent1: The artist used ultrafine brushes to create intricate details in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The ultrafine sand felt smooth between my fingers at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The chef sprinkled ultrafine glitter on the cupcakes for a touch of magic.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrafine attention to detail made her the best detective in town.
meanings.sent5: The ultrafine mist from the waterfall created a dreamy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Beyond what is considered normal or standard.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's ultrafine strength allowed him to lift cars effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The ultrafine speed of the car left everyone amazed at the race.
meanings.sent3: The ultrafine intelligence of the robot made it the star of the science fair.
meanings.sent4: Her ultrafine courage in the face of danger inspired everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The ultrafine beauty of the sunset took our breath away.
